Sentence: 年齢確認させていただく場合がございます
Meaning: We may ask you to verify your age.

Sentence: 節電にご協力ください
先に席をお取りください
Meaning: Please Take a Seat before Ordering.

Sentence: 食券を買ってから席にお着きください
Meaning: Please buy a meal ticket before sitting down.

Sentence: 食べ終わりましたら、食器類は返却口までお願いします
Meaning: Please return your used dishes to the return counter.

Sentence: ゴミは持ち帰りましょう
Meaning: Please Take Your Trash with You.

Sentence: 足元にご注意ください
ドアの反対側に人がいる場合があります
Meaning: There may be people on the other side of the door.

Sentence: ご用の際はボタンを押してください
席にご案内しますのでお待ちください
当店は前払い制となっております
Meaning: Payment Must Be Made in Advance.

Sentence: お1人様、1品以上のご注文をお願いいたします
Meaning: All customers must order at least one item.

Sentence: 冷房中につき、ドアはお閉めください
Meaning: The air conditioning is on. Please keep the door closed.

Sentence: かぶり物をご試着の際には、必ずフェイスカバーをご利用ください
Meaning: Please use a face cover when trying on pull-over items.

Sentence: 商品の返品は7日以内にお願いします
Meaning: Returns Accepted within 7 Days of Purchase.

Sentence: 試着室への持ち込みは3点までです
Meaning: 3 Items per Person in Changing Rooms.

Sentence: 不良品以外は交換できません
Meaning: Returns Accepted for Defective Goods Only.
